channel.title: Posts on Spectrum Efficiency
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Spectrum Efficiency

item.title: Flowchart support
item.author: spectrum.efficiency.limited@gmail.com (Andrei Stoian)
item.description: st=>start: Start|past:>http://www.google.com[blank] e=>end: End|future:>http://www.google.com op1=>operation: My Operation|past op2=>operation: Stuff|current sub1=>subroutine: My Subroutine|invalid cond=>condition: Yes or No?|approved:>http://www.google.com c2=>condition: Good idea|rejected io=>inputoutput: catch something...|future st->op1(right)->cond cond(yes, right)->c2 cond(no)->sub1(left)->op1 c2(yes)->io->e c2(no)->op2->e
item.dc:creator: Andrei Stoian

item.title: How did I come up with the logo for Spectrum Efficiency?
item.author: spectrum.efficiency.limited@gmail.com (Andrei Stoian)
item.description: What is Spectum Efficiency I started my journey in the corporate world. Before coming to New Zealand, I was planning, drive testing, optimizing 3G, and 4G networks in Europe. As a Radio Frequency Engineer, one mostly works for the vendors. In my case, I have worked for: Alcatel-Lucent(Nokia) Huawei My first job in New Zealand is where I met the regulator of this country for the first time.
item.dc:creator: Andrei Stoian
